name: Dale Gundy
text: I liked the look of blaze pizza. I liked the employees at blaze pizza. I like that they had vegan options. I liked the price at blaze pizza. I didn't like that there was too much semolina on the pizza. My pizza had a burnt taste. And the semolina was black and all over my fingers.

name: Tiffany Adair

text: Love the vegan, vegetarian  and gluten-free choices they have. Love the toppings and most importantly...eating it all.

name: Darshan Subramanya
text: Ordered a vegetarian make your own pizza, for pickup. It was made perfectly and tasted amazing. The order was ready right on time for pickup, did nt have to wait at all. Five stars!!

name: Bret Gibson
text: Good pizza for the most part. Good service at a reasonable price.

name: Sandra Lockwood
text: Blaze will build a pizza to your order; then it is baked quickly and delivered to you to eat in or take out.  Pizzas are all one size except for the newly added party size.  Ingredients are fresh, and pizzas as a whole are appetizing.  On ‚Ä¶More

text: This place has amazing personalized food. The vibe in here was very calm, relaxed, yet edgy. The people there were very patient and efficient. I adore their open pizza oven and while you wait to order you get to watch them handcraft the dough.

name: Doug Kelley

text: Delicious pizza at an affordable price. You can do build your own or they have great preset options. My favorites are the Veg out and the BBQ Chicken! Seating can get a bit scarce around noon however.

name: Nick Vaughn
text: Definitely the best vegan pizza I've ever had. All their crust is vegan including the rising thick crust. They have vegan cheese and a vegan tofu "chicken" topping. They were super accommodating, they put new gloves on and used a clean pizza cutter because I ordered my pizza with vegan items and no meat.

name: Doug
text: After a couple of different issues and a complaint to corporate I felt like tonight they paid attention to my order and treated me with respect. Was it because of the free pizza I had? No I think it was the current crew and the time I was there. So for tonight the visit and the service.

name: Blaise G
text: I went to Blaze Pizza during lunch time.  The staff is very efficient. The wait time between ordering and getting my pizza was not bad.  I love the thin crust they use; the sauce is good and a wide variety of toppings is  available.  I'll definitely go here again.
